p: All WWUD interviewed reported one or more gender-based vulnerability issues. In total, 92 (88.5%) of the women interviewed had ever suffered emotional or psychological damage by a partner Seventy-four (71.2%) women reported having experienced at least one incident of serious physical injury, and 51 (49%) had ever suffered sexual abuse. Thirty-one (28.4%) women admitted to have ever exchange sex for money/drugs, though 18 (17.1%) did not answer to this question; 47 (44.3%) had a stable partner, all of whom used drugs.
